    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Menstruation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menstruation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Menstruation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Menstruation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periodo mestruale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμμηνόρροια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Menstruación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the monthly cycle of menstruation in humans, starting from the release of an ovum from the ovary, to the excretion of the hardened lining in the uterus.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">menstrual cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">menstruation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ovary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ovum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">uterus lining</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Monatsschleife von 
Menstruation in den Menschen und fährt von der Freigabe eines ovum 
vom Eierstock, zur Ausscheidung des verhärteten Futters in der 
Gebärmutter ab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre le cycle mensuel de la 
menstruation chez l'homme, à partir de la version d'un ovule de
l'ovaire, à l'excrétion de la doublure durcie dans l'utérus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra o ciclo mensal do 
menstruation nos seres humanos, partindo da liberação de um ovum do 
ovary, ao excretion do forro endurecido no uterus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra il ciclo mensile del periodo
mestruale in esseri umani, a partire dalla versione di un ovum 
dall'ovaia, all'escrezione del rivestimento indurito nell'utero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μηνιαίο κύκλο της 
εμμηνόρροιας στους ανθρώπους, που αρχίζουν από την έκδοση ενός 
ωαρίου από την ωοθήκη, στην έκκριση της επένδυσης στη μήτρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra el ciclo mensual de la 
menstruación en seres humanos, empezando con el desbloquear de un 
ovum del ovario, a la excreción de la guarnición endurecida en el 
útero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
